verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H365>Aijeleth<s%> <S%H7842>Shahar,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> My <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me? why are you so <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H3467>helping<s%> me, and from the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H7581>roaring?<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> in the day <S%H3119>time,<s%> but you <S%H6030>hear<s%> not; and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> season, and am not <S%H1747>silent.<s%>
But you are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> O you that <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in you: they <S%H982>trusted,<s%> and you did <S%H6403>deliver<s%> them.
They <S%H2199>cried<s%> to you, and were <S%H4422>delivered:<s%> they <S%H982>trusted<s%> in you, and were not <S%H954>confounded.<s%>
But I am a <S%H8438>worm,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> they that <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H3932>laugh<s%> me to scorn: they <S%H6362>shoot<s%> out the <S%H8193>lip,<s%> they <S%H5128>shake<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> saying,
He <S%H1556>trusted<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that he would <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him: let him <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him, seeing he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in him.
But you are he that <S%H1518>took<s%> me out of the <S%H990>womb:<s%> you did make me <S%H982>hope<s%> when I was on my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
I was <S%H7993>cast<s%> on you from the <S%H7358>womb:<s%> you are my <S%H410>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>belly.<s%>
Be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; for <S%H6869>trouble<s%> is <S%H7138>near;<s%> for there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me: <S%H47>strong<s%> bulls of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have <S%H3803>beset<s%> me <S%H3803>round.<s%>
They <S%H6475>gaped<s%> on me with their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> as a <S%H2963>ravening<s%> and a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion.<s%>

I am <S%H8210>poured<s%> out like <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are out of <S%H6504>joint:<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is like <S%H1749>wax;<s%> it is <S%H4549>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H4578>bowels.<s%>

My <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up like a <S%H2789>potsherd;<s%> and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to my <S%H4455>jaws;<s%> and you have <S%H8239>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

For <S%H3611>dogs<s%> have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me: the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%> have <S%H5362>enclosed<s%> me: they <S%H738>pierced<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones:<s%> they <S%H5027>look<s%> and <S%H7200>stare<s%> on me.
They <S%H2505>part<s%> my <S%H899>garments<s%> among them, and <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> on my <S%H3830>clothing.<s%>
But be not you <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> O my <S%H360>strength,<s%> <S%H2363>haste<s%> you to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> my <S%H3173>darling<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3611>dog.<s%>
<S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> for you have <S%H6030>heard<s%> me from the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>unicorns.<s%>
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers:<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> you.

You that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> him; <S%H3605>all<s%> you the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> him; and <S%H1481>fear<s%> him, <S%H3605>all<s%> you the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For he has not <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8262>abhorred<s%> the <S%H6039>affliction<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> has he <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from him; but when he <S%H7768>cried<s%> to him, he <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
My <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be of you in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation:<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> they shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him: your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%> shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
For the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's:<s%> and he is the <S%H4910>governor<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> they that be <S%H1879>fat<s%> on <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H7812>worship:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and <S%H3808>none<s%> can keep <S%H2421>alive<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
A <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him; it shall be <S%H5608>accounted<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> for a <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
They shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born,<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> this.
